#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,len,i,j,count;
	char a[1001];
	char x[11][11];
	strcpy(x[0]," ");
	strcpy(x[2],"ABC");
	strcpy(x[3],"DEF");
	strcpy(x[4],"GHI");
	strcpy(x[5],"JKL");
	strcpy(x[6],"MNO");
	strcpy(x[7],"PQRS");
	strcpy(x[8],"TUV");
	strcpy(x[9],"WXYZ");
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",&a[0]);
		len=strlen(a);
		//printf("The entered string is : %s\n",a);
		count=0;
		for(i=0; i<len; i++)
		{
			if(a[i]=='#')
				continue;
			if(a[i]==a[i+1])
			{
				count++;
			}
			else
			{
				//printf("%d->",count);
				j=a[i]-'0';
				printf("%c",x[j][count]);
				count=0;
			}
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
